page.title: 18Education - Adult Training
page.content: We visited the Adult Training Centre near school. It has 170 men & women, aged between 18 & 45, all of whom are mentally & physically handicapped. They are trained to wash, dress, shop, travel & cook by themselves. Everyone at the Centre is encouraged to take part in outside activities. There is a waiting list of people to join the centre. The Centre has a budget of between 7000 & 8000 pounds per year. This costs the ratepayer a lot of money. The Centre has a large workshop which has been sub-divided into areas where people can do needlework, woodwork or metal work. There is also a gardening room where various plants are grown and where most of the equipment has been made in the woodwork area. There are 10 members of staff and some extra helpers.
